Spansion:OnTheFlyPower.NAME: On The Fly
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal damage to a random enemy when you discard a card.

Spansion:AspectOfTheCrowPower.NAME: Aspect of the Crow
DESCRIPTIONS: temporary strength and Dexterity when you play a card.

Spansion:CauterizingBloodPower.NAME: CauterizingBloodPower
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, restore
health (half of damage taken this turn.)
